title: No More Daddy's Girl
itunes:title: No More Daddy's Girl
description:
Today on the show we opened up the phone lines after NBA Young Boy's video went viral of him ranting and disrespecting his girlfriends father who happen to be Floyd Mayweather, and we asked what out listeners would do if their daughter boyfriend said the things he said. Also, we opened up the phone lines to see what other battles they would like to see live on ig. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a man that was complaining about only getting $1,200 from the stimulus package.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
